summary:
This mod adds the armor of the mighty Duke Vampire, dissapeared during a revolt ,inside Castle Volkihar,
involving Lord Harkon and Valerica.
descriptionHtml:
Hi folks, the other day i made this armour for personal use and i though, why dont sharing it? well there it is.

The mod contains the Duke Vampire set (armour, gloves, boots, hood) which is a variation of the royal vampire set (new color, new pauldron, less skirt, less cape...)
Its temperable and supports all races. (see pictures) to upgrade it you need leather and a daedra heart.
Its only for male characters (since i think the royal vampire armour looks cool on female characters) but female characters can still use the hood, gloves and boots.
There is no body slider, sorry...

The set has similar stats to the glass set.


The chest containing the armor can be found somewhere in Castle Volkihar.
If you can't find it, the location is at the end of the Readme.


Have fun and remember to endorse if you liked it  :)

-Requirements-
Dawnguard DLC

-Installation-
Drop the Data folder into your:  SteamApps\common\Skyrim

-Credits-
Bethesda for doing CK and Skyrim
L0rd Of War for importing the Witcher 2 Armors
Hood mesh:  AmethystDeceiver http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?
Mr. Dave for his help duirng the process, man you are so damn pro :D http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12060/?

You cannot sell or redistribute this mod to other pages.
author: Magnalenian
